sentences.en: He was driven to the brink of madness.
I repeat that medicine is on the brink of a revolution.
sentences.cn: 我要再次强调，医学面临着变革。

sentences.en: I was certain I was on the brink of poverty, going to the poorhouse.
sentences.cn: 我确信自己已处在贫困的边缘，马上就要进济贫院了。

sentences.en: The church seems to be on the brink of schism.
sentences.cn: 教会似乎处于分裂的边缘。

sentences.en: The club are on the brink of promotion to the Premier League.
sentences.cn: 俱乐部即将晋级超级联赛。

sentences.en: The company is on the brink of bankruptcy.
sentences.cn: 该公司已濒临于破产的边缘.

sentences.en: The farmers say recent inflation has driven them to the brink of ruin.
sentences.cn: 农民们说最近的通货膨胀使他们濒临破产。

sentences.en: The King now stands on the brink of a political precipice.
sentences.cn: 国王现在处于政治上岌岌可危的境地。

sentences.en: The tree grew on the brink of the cliff.
sentences.cn: 那棵树生长在峭壁的边缘.

sentences.en: Their economy is teetering on the brink of collapse.
sentences.cn: 他们的经济徘徊在崩溃的边缘。

sentences.en: These monsters would not lay down their cleavers even when on the brink of their own destruction.
sentences.cn: 这些魔鬼临死也不会放下屠刀.

sentences.en: They are on the brink of resolving their long-standing dispute over money.
sentences.cn: 他们很快就能解决长期以来的金钱纠纷。

sentences.en: They sparred for a moment, on the brink of a full fight.
sentences.cn: 他们互相推搡了一会儿，眼看就要大打出手了。

sentences.en: Three of the hotels are in receivership, and others are teetering on the brink of bankruptcy.
sentences.cn: 有3家宾馆已破产在管，其他几家正在破产的边缘徘徊。

sentences.en: We were on the brink of disaster when the rescue team arrived.
sentences.cn: 当救生队到达时,我们已经处于灾难的边缘.

words.tran_cn: 边缘政策；紧急政策，外交冒险政策

trans.tran_en: a situation when you are almost in a new situation, usually a bad one
